section.para: The ngx_stream_ssl_preread_module module (1.11.5) allows extracting information from the ClientHello message without terminating SSL/TLS, for example, the sever name requested through SNI or protocols advertised in ALPN. This module is not built by default, it should be enabled with the --with-stream_ssl_preread_module configuration parameter.

section.name: Example Configuration

directive.name: ssl_preread
directive.para: Enables extracting information from the ClientHello message at the preread phase.
